players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso and I found out during my investigation...."
Bob: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie first instead of someone more suspicious? This seems off."
Charlie: "Alice, if you're the real detective, why did you wait until after the kill to reveal? You could have saved Diana."
Bob: "Charlie makes a good point. Alice, why didn't you reveal your investigation before the night kill if you knew Charlie was mafia? This timing seems suspicious."
Charlie: "Alice's story doesn't add up. A real detective would have revealed before the night kill to save Diana. She's trying to frame me."
You: "I understand your concerns, Bob and Charlie. Let me explain my actions:..."

Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
